renderpass.code:
// regolfing "star field 4 (433 chars)" by FabriceNeyret2. https://shadertoy.com/view/ltBXDd
// ( more readable below )


#define R  fract( 1e4* sin(  mat2(1234,-53,457,-17) * I//
#define M(U,i)  (                                                 \
     I = ceil( V = U * (t.i+.75) / exp2(t.i*8.-5.) ),             \
     r = .13 + 6.* R +1.)),                                       \
	 r.x > .79 ? 1. : dot( V = ( .6*R))-.8 - V+I ) / r.x , V ) ) //
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) {
    vec2 U = u / iResolution.y - .5, I,V,r;
    vec3 t = fract( iTime/8. + vec3(-1,0,1)/3.  ) -.5;
    O += dot( 1.+cos(6.28*t) , .015/vec3( M(U,x), M(-U,y), M(U.yx,z) ) );} /*





// --- 313 chars

#define R  fract( 1e4* sin(  mat2(1234,-53,457,-17) * I//
#define M(U,i)  (                                                 \
     I = ceil( V = U * (t.i+.75) / exp2(t.i*8.-5.) ),             \
     r = R +1.)),                                                 \
	 r.x > .11 ? 1. : dot( V = ( .6*R))-.8 - V+I ) / (.13+6.*r.x) , V ) ) //
#define mainImage(O,u)                                            \
    vec2 U = u / iResolution.y - .5, I,V,r;                       \
    vec3 t = fract( iTime/8. + vec3(-1,0,1)/3.  ) -.5;            \
    O += dot( 1.+cos(6.28*t) , .015/vec3( M(U,x), M(-U,y), M(U.yx,z) ) ) /*





// --- 327 chars

#define R(U) fract( 1e4* sin(  U * mat2(1234,-53,457,-17) ) )    //
#define M(U,i)  (                                                 \
     I = ceil( V = U * ( (t+6./D) /exp2(t*D-5.) ).i ),            \
     r = R(1.+I).x,                                               \
	 r > .11 ? 1. : dot( V = ( .6*R(I)-.8 - V+I ) / (.13+6.*r) , V ) ) //
#define mainImage(O,u)                                            \
    float D=8.,r;                                                 \
    vec2 U = u / iResolution.y - .5, I,V;                         \
    vec3 t = fract( iTime/D + vec3(-1,0,1)/3.  ) -.5;             \
    O += dot( 1.+cos(6.28*t) , .015/vec3( M(U,x), M(-U,y), M(U.yx,z) ) ) /*





// --- 345 chars

#define R(U) fract( 1e4* sin(  U*mat2(1234,-53,457,-17) ) )      //
#define M(U,t)  (                                                 \
     I = ceil( V = U/exp2(t-8.) / D*(3.+t) ),                     \
     r = 9.* R(1.+I).x,                                           \
	 r > 1. ? 1. : length( .6*R(I)-.8 - V+I ) * 8./(1.+5.*r) )   //
#define mainImage(O,u)                                            \
    float D=8.,r;                                                 \
    vec2 U = u / iResolution.y - .5, I,V;                         \
    vec3 t = fract( iTime/D + vec3(-1,0,1)/3.  ) -.5,             \
         T = t*D+3.;                                              \
    T = vec3( M(U,T.x), M(-U,T.y), M(U.yx,T.z) );                 \
    O += dot( .5+.5*cos(6.28*t) , .03/T/T )                                          /*





// --- 368 chars

#define R(U,d) fract( 1e4* sin( d + U*mat2(1234,-53,457,-17) ) ) //
#define M(U,t)  (                                                 \
     I = ceil( V = U/exp2(t-8.) / D*(3.+t)),                      \
     r = 9.* R(I,1.).x,                                           \
	 r > 1. ? 1. : length( .2+.6*R(I,) - fract(V) ) * 8./(1.+5.*r) ) //
#define mainImage(o,u)                                            \
    float D=8.,r;                                                 \
    vec2 U = u / iResolution.y - .5, I,V;                         \
         t = fract( iTime/D + vec3(-1,0,1)/3. +.5 ) -.5,  T,      \
         w = .5+.5*cos(6.28*t);                                   \
    t = t*D+3.;                                                   \
    T.x = M(U,t.x),  T.y = M(-U,t.y),  T.z = M(U.yx,t.z);         \
    o += dot(w,.03/T/T)                                          /*

/**/
renderpass.name: Image
